find_places: Discover Top Attractions, Events, Offers, Dining & Places with AI
helping: Your Smart Guide to Places, Travel, Events, Offers & Experiences
about_para: MyGuideAI is the smart travel companion app for the UAE. It helps you discover top attractions, local events, restaurants, and hotel deals in Dubai, Abu Dhabi, and worldwide.
mission_para: To simplify travel planning with AI-driven, personalized recommendations for every journey.
vision_para: To become the world’s most trusted AI travel and events guide.
history_para: Innovation, personalization, user-centric design, and seamless travel experiences
find_places_with_ai: Find Places, Events, Deals, Hotels and Restaurants, with AI in seconds
business_writing: A Business for writing better code called chirp
offer_para: MyGuideAI leverages AI to deliver personalized travel recommendations, ensuring you discover attractions, events, places and offers tailored just for you. MyGuideAI, your smart travel companion offering insights on local events, restaurants, and hotel deals in the UAE and worldwide.
helpful_para: Download MyGuideAI App to discover Top Attractions, Events, Offers, Dining & Places with AI in the UAE and worldwide.
discount_para: Enjoy the wide variety of partners for offers and discounts. Benefit from a diverse range of partner offers and discounts.
events_para: Talk to our AI personal assistant to discover places and get weather updates. AI-driven, personalized recommendations simplify travel planning.
latest_coupon: Discover top offers, discounts, events, and destinations in Abu Dhabi and worldwide with MyGuideAI.
offer_para: Access a wide range of offers and discounts from a variety of partners stores in your area or anywhere in the world.Access a wide range of offers and discounts from a variety of partners stores in your area or anywhere in the world.
MyGuidAI helps you to discover and access the upcoming events in town. Let our AI engine show you what is happening around you.
Explore top tourist destinations such as hotels, parks, venues, entertainment places in Abu Dhabi, Dubabi and acorss the world.
